articles.title: Google is practically giving away Pixel 8 phones, especially if you're a YouTube Premium subscriber - Android Central
articles.description: The exclusive $125 discount can be stacked with Google's other holiday deals.
articles.content:

  • The offer can be stacked with other holiday deals for total savings of up to $325.
